text: Ntimuzarongore ababangikanyamanakazi keretse babanje kwemera (Allah), kandi rwose umuja w’umwemera aruta umubangikanyamanakazi (ufite ubwigenge) n’ubwo yaba ahebuje (mu bwiza). Ndetse ntimuzashyingire ababangikanyamana keretse babanje kwemera, kandi rwose umucakara w’umwemera aruta umubangikanyamana n’ubwo yaba abashimisha (mu bwiza). Abo (ababangikanyamana) bahamagarira kugana umuriro, naho Allah agahamagarira kugana ijuru no kubabarirwa ibyaha ku bushake bwe, anasobanurira abantu amategeko ye kugira ngo bibuke
